# Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Title

Cultus Lake Laboratory Sanitary System Upgrades
F1700-220118B

### Reference Number

WS3855662648 - Doc3861500373
    - *Portal access: [insert link]*

### Amendment Details

This tender has undergone 1 amendment since its publication on February 7, 2023.
Amendment details are available upon request.

### Tender Overview

The Canadian government invites interested contractors to submit bids for the construction of a sewerage system upgrade at the Cultus Lake Fisheries Laboratory (Departement of Fisheries and Oceans, DFO) and Cultus Lake Park in Cultus Lake, British Columbia.

### Project Objectives

The objectives of this project are:

* Supply and installation of new sewerage system components
* Construction of a new sewerage system infrastructure, including gravity collection piping, forcemain piping, manholes, pumps, wet well, and connections to the existing standby generator and electrical control systems.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** February 23, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 15, 2023

### Selection and Evaluation Criteria

* Respotified quotations will be evaluated based on the lowest price

### Buyer Specifications

* Results are required under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Results are not limited to any region

### Contract Language

English and French
